topic.title: Cable Reserve and Load to Bypass

body.p: Reserve power cables and Load power cables are run from overhead to Retrofit Bypass Cabinet bus bars.
To make overhead cable entry easier, Reserve and Load bus bars are staggered in the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet. Reserve and Load Power Cables

li.p: Run Load power cables through overhead cable entry to Bypass Output Bus Bars (to busway).

Connect ABCNG cables to Bus Bars.
Torque ½”-13 bolts to 57 ft-lbs.
Torque M12 bolts to 77 Nm.
Run Reserve power cables through overhead cable entry to Bypass Reserve Bus Bars.

Connect ABCNG cables to Bus Bars
Torque ½”-13 bolts to 57 ft-lbs.
Torque M12 bolts to 77 Nm.Phase connections on LH and RH units are mirror images of each other.
